issue.title: [C++] Dockerfile for running Infer static analysis
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2980](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2980). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similar to ARROW-2952, it would be useful to periodically run Infer to find problems that can be found with static analysis. This was added to the codebase in ARROW-1626 https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/build-support/run-infer.sh
